PS1 Cat examples

Source: vignettes/PS1_Cat.Rmd
PS1_Cat.Rmd
library(panstarrs)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(magrittr)

Example 1

Get MeanPSFMag in grizy filters from catalog for KQ Uma

1. Get coords for source 

coords <- ps1_mast_resolve('KQ Uma')
coords
#> $ra
#> [1] 139.3343
#> 
#> $decl
#> [1] 68.63514

2. Do a cone search 

df_cone <- ps1_cone(ra = coords$ra, 
               dec = coords$decl,
               r_arcmin = 0.01,
               table = 'mean',
               release = 'dr2')
df_cone %>% select(matches('[grizy]MeanPSFMag$'))
#>    gMeanPSFMag rMeanPSFMag iMeanPSFMag zMeanPSFMag yMeanPSFMag
#> 1:     15.0402      14.553     14.2109     14.2814     14.3041

3. Or use crossmatch 

df_cross <- ps1_crossmatch(ra = coords$ra, 
               dec = coords$decl,
               r_arcmin = 0.01,
               table = 'mean',
               release = 'dr2')
df_cross %>% select(matches('[grizy]MeanPSFMag$'))
#>    gMeanPSFMag rMeanPSFMag iMeanPSFMag zMeanPSFMag yMeanPSFMag
#> 1:     15.0402      14.553     14.2109     14.2814     14.3041

Example 2

Cross-matching with PS1 catalog 

ps1_crossmatch(ra = c(268.70342, 168.87258), 
              dec = c(71.54292, 60.75153),
              table= 'mean',
              release = 'dr2') %>% 
  arrange(`_searchID_`, dstArcSec) %>% 
  select(1:4,7)
#>        _ra_   _dec_ _searchID_            MatchID dstArcSec
#> 1: 268.7034 71.5429          0 193852687043832438  1.247224
#> 2: 268.7034 71.5429          0 193852687032912825  1.717840
#> 3: 268.7034 71.5429          0 193852687025391786  1.826144
#> 4: 268.7034 71.5429          0 193852687053472181  2.230214
#> 5: 268.7034 71.5429          0 193852687052801597  2.913863
#> 6: 268.7034 71.5429          0 193852687059232498  2.967532
#> 7: 168.8726 60.7515          1 180901688728602532  0.469950
#> 8: 168.8726 60.7515          1 180901688732442143  1.609482
